original_text: Then Moses told Aaron everything the Lord had sent him to say, and also about all the signs he had commanded him to perform.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 분부하여 보내신 모든 말씀과 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 모든 이적을 아론에게 알리니라

sentences.original_text: everything the Lord had sent him to say
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그에게 말하라고 보내신 모든 것을

sentences.original_text: and also about all the signs
he had commanded him to perform
